attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the law needs to be changed, as citizens of this country, we have the right to know who and where murderers are, for the protection of the public, not least those who unwhittingly may become involved with them. protection should be afforded to the victims and witnesses of crime. we don't have to protect murderers, you the government choose to protect them.  I hope we vote with our feet on this issue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
